overview: Roma, a humble soul from the rural country, embarks on a trip to the city where she has been living for the past year and a half. While starting her new life in the city she meets Lydia, a witty biochemistry student, who soon became her lover. On their last night together, Roma and Lydia stroll around the desolate city. Unable to hail a cab or catch a bus, they are forced to face the flaws of their love, discussing their opposing schools of thought and the reality of their withering relationship.
title: Affinity
